attributes.action: Review the 1% pay rise and pay NHS workers what they deserve.
attributes.additional_details: They have been through some of the toughest conditions people can work in and have shown not only how amazing the NHS is but just how much they are needed. 1% just isn't enough and the public will happily pay more.
attributes.background: Look at the pay review of NHS workers and give them a pay rise that reflects all the hard work they put in day in day out.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
